original_text: Do not trust people to help you. They are weak and they will all die one day. They are not strong enough to help you. Do not trust people to help you. They are weak and they will all die one day. They are not strong enough to help you.
korean_text: 너희는 인생을 의지하지 말라 그의 호흡은 코에 있나니 셈할 가치가 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: Do not trust people to help you.
and they will all die one day.
They are not strong enough to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 돕기에 충분히 강하지 않다.
